title: Drawing, "Landscape at Sunset, Jamaica", July 1865
medium: Graphite with brush and white gouache on gray wove paper
markings: Verso:  Stamped in ink at center: Lugt 457d.
signed: Signed in graphite at lower center with monogram and date: July / 65
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with figures throughout,and begining at top left through to bottom right:  cool blue grey;  reflected pink of (ange);  Delicate glow / warm;  lost;  orange red;  gold streaks;  glow;  purp(le);  blue;  brown green;  Mango silver edged. Bottom right:  2 silver grey light / 4 steel purp(le)/  Dark / 5 purp(le) /  6 warm purp(le) /  7 laky golden purp(le) ice /  8 lovely laky reflection/ from above; and again, at bottom center:  Sun set/ Jamaica / July//65  / FEC.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Landscape at Sunset, Jamaica", July 1865.
July 1865. Graphite with brush and white gouache on gray wove paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-690.
